name: What's Behind the Door? [DEMO]
description:
This game is a short demo of a project I am working on. Use WASD to move and Mouse Button 1 to interact, press Esc at any time to close the game. You play as Dave, a simple working man who just got home to start the game. The game isn't anywhere close to a finished product, the sound and dialog aren't finalized, and some assets could use reworking, but overall pretty proud of my accomplishment of a demo as I haven't been able to stick with a project for years. Constructive Criticism is greatly appreciated.

A list of known bugs/unintentional design include: Scene switching taking longer than usual, dialog not being properly displayed, UI clipping off screen, and more
